In Windows 8.1, It will open the previous window.

by an "A". in Windows 10 it will open the action center.
The action center gives you quick access to
your computer settings. Easy.
Combination Number Three: The combination
of Wind key and "B" Key
selects the first icon in the notification area.
You can then switch between the icons
using the arrow keys.
Combination Number Four:
"Win" key + control key followed by "B".
This combination switches to a program
indicating a new message in the notification area.
